fractal.fractal_cmd module

class fractal.fractal_cmd.TaskModel(*, name: str, depends_on: str = None, input_type: str, output_type: str)

Bases: pydantic.main.BaseModel

Create a new model by parsing and validating input data from keyword arguments.

Raises ValidationError if the input data cannot be parsed to form a valid model.

depends_on: Optional[str]

fractal.luigi_wrap module

class fractal.luigi_wrap.WorkflowTask(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: luigi.task.Task

WorkflowTask class takes a dictionary as input in which are stored all the inputs for tasks. It is an extension of the luigi.Task class.

flags = <luigi.parameter.DictParameter object>
run()

Method from base class. Here return a generator of tasks.

complete()

Method from base class to check if run method has finished.
